Improve this doc

Missing Hash Prefix
error in component $location 

Invalid url "{0}", missing hash prefix "{1}".

Description

This error occurs when $location ***REMOVED*** is configured to use a hash prefix but this prefix was not present in a url that the $location ***REMOVED*** was asked to parse.

For example if you configure $location ***REMOVED*** with prefix '!':

myApp.config(function($locationProvider) {
  $locationProvider.prefix('!');
});

If you enter the app at url http:/myapp.com/#/myView this error will be throw.

The correct url for this configuration is http:/myapp.com/#!/myView (note the '!' after '#' symbol).
